meanings.definition: Concise use of words in writing or speech.
meanings.sent1: Her speech was admired for its brevity and clarity.
meanings.sent2: The brevity of the poem made it easy to memorize.
meanings.sent3: The brevity of his text messages always made her smile.
meanings.sent4: In a world of long novels, his brevity stood out like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The brevity of the meeting left everyone surprised and impressed.

meanings.sent1: The brevity of the movie made it perfect for a quick break.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated the brevity of the rain shower on his walk.
meanings.sent3: The brevity of the power outage was a relief on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The brevity of childhood seemed to vanish in the blink of an eye.
meanings.sent5: The brevity of the concert left the audience wanting more.
